1.title: Four Year Strong
1.plot: Mike frustrates the team with big demands on a tight schedule: creating custom drum kits for the band Four Year Strong and the Boys and Girls Club of America within a week.

2.title: Dropkick Murphys
2.plot: Confusion arises over a custom drum kit for Dropkick Murphys, a Massachusetts band who made it big, and tempers flare between the brothers.

3.title: Hanson
3.plot: One of the staff's favorite groups, Every Time I Die, requests an alligator-themed custom drum kit within days.

4.title: Every Time I Die
4.plot: One of the staff's favorite groups, Every Time I Die, requests an alligator-themed custom drum kit within days.

5.title: Eric Church
5.plot: Pressure mounts as the guys have a week to create custom drum kits for country artist Eric Church's drummer and the music therapy program at Boston's Franciscan Hospital for Children.

imdb.plot outline: Drum Heads is a half hour docu-series that follows "drum head" brothers Mike (24) & Scott (25) Ciprari as they run their custom drum company, SJC Drums, out of their home town of Dudely, Massachusetts. Cameras follow the brothers through their ups & downs of running their family business that they started out of their grandparents' basement while still in high school. Along with their best friends & family's help - they design, create & build custom drum kits for the biggest performing acts of our time. Even though Mike & Scott don't always get along, they have still managed to turn their small town dreams into a worldwide reality!
imdb.title: Drum Heads
plot: _Drum Heads_ (qv) is a half hour docu-series that follows "drum head" brothers Mike (24) & Scott (25) Ciprari as they run their custom drum company, SJC Drums, out of their home town of Dudely, Massachusetts. Cameras follow the brothers through their ups & downs of running their family business that they started out of their grandparents' basement while still in high school. Along with their best friends & family's help - they design, create & build custom drum kits for the biggest performing acts of our time. Even though Mike & Scott don't always get along, they have still managed to turn their small town dreams into a worldwide reality!::Halogen TV
